ygData.subject: Badlands (map)
ygData.msgSnippet: I made a map called Badlands, which I put up on my site:  http://plaza.v-wave.com/shayd/ This is the first map designed by myself for the public, and I tried
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 17
Message-ID: <17248.17.53.959279670@...>
Date: 15 Feb 1999 08:53:06 -0000
From: shayd@...
Subject: Badlands (map)


I made a map called Badlands, which I put up on
my site:  http://plaza.v-wave.com/shayd/

This is the first map designed by myself for
the public, and I tried to maintain the balance
the game has already established as much as possible, as far as earnings go.

This is a pretty difficult map, so unless your
team has gone through all the levels and has
some powerful characters, (or you're a cheating
bastard) you might have quite a bit of trouble
with it.

-shayd

ps--can i say bastard?
